I don't think any of the current decide rules can accomplish this behavior.=
 In order to accomplish this you would need to write new decide rules that =
only applied to URLs whose 'source seed' matched some list. This is fairly =
straightforward to implement, but I can imagine that configuring a crawl th=
at uses such seed conditional rules, could be very complicated and error pr=
one.

- Kristinn
